nodes.bodyText:
Are we sure this doesn't break the API?
If a user had written:  method(ScoreDirector<MyRoster> ...) it wouldn't have compiled
But if a user had written
beforeEntityAdded(ScoreDirector scoreDirector, ...) {
   ((ScoreDirector<MyRoster>) scoreDirector).getMyShiftList()...
   ...
}

Would that still compile?
Would it compile if the method signature was ScoreDirector<?> instead of ScoreDirector?
I've removed <Solution_> from the new VariableListener. This should remove all potential for generic corner case problems.
